channel.title: Comments on: TradeMe extension for Magento

item.title: By: Selling Internationally? Look Beyond Amazon and eBay
item.dc:creator: Selling Internationally? Look Beyond Amazon and eBay
item.description: […] aren’t many tools that integrate directly with TradeMe. We use a Magento plug-in called mVentory and it feeds into Volo from there for order […]
